 2005-18282005-10-25TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActAeronautics Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (PARTS IV AND VI) by creating a new passenger-carrying rating for ultra-light aeroplanes which would allow a permit holder to carry one other passenger if there are no restrictions on the plane to the contrary.
